The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's disease. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his fingers going white. Like it or not he is cold all the damn time. Whether he is mad or cold, his baseline coldness is just permanently cold.

I was hoping for a treat to watch, but I think it was pretty much boring. If any, I would recommend reading the book first.
